hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT DISTINCT EBLC.EBLC_ID, EBLC.EBLC_CODE, EBLC.EBLC_NAME_SHORT, EBLC.EBLC_NAME_CN, EBLC.EBLC_NAME_EN, EBLC.EBLC_ADDRESS FROM EB_LOCATION EBLC WHERE 1=1 AND EBLC.REC_STATUS=0 <<AND EBLC.ORG_ID = :orgId>> <<AND EBLC.EBLC_CODE LIKE '%' || :eblcCode || '%'>> <<AND EBLC.EBLC_NAME_CN like '%' || :eblcNameCn || '%' >> << AND EBLC.EBLC_ADDRESS like '%' || :eblcAddress || '%'>> <<AND EBLC.EBLC_ADDRESS IN (:eblcAddressLst)>>
